job_tasks.phrase: Execute demonstrations, POCs, and evaluations through coordination of the physical and human resources of Dataiku and the customer; lead the combined team to carry out the agreed upon course of action to prove that Dataiku delivers the needed value better than our competitors
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes leading a team to execute technical demonstrations and proofs of concept, which involves coordinating resources and guiding technical actions to showcase product value. This aligns with the integration and delivery aspects of software, even if the core development isn't the focus.

job_tasks.phrase: Answer questions and provide technical guidance to the customer's technical team regarding the demonstrated or evaluated solutions
job_tasks.justification: Providing technical guidance to a customer's team involves understanding their needs and the business context of the solution being demonstrated, aligning with business understanding and strategic communication.

job_tasks.phrase: Assist in sales pipeline building activities including attendance at live and/or virtual trade-shows and industry conferences, working with marketing and or partners on campaign design and execution and other activities specified by sales and pre-sales management
job_tasks.justification: This task involves supporting sales and marketing efforts, which requires understanding business goals, market positioning, and customer engagement strategies.

job_tasks.phrase: Provide regular updates on your activities to support accurate regional forecasting, participate in continuous development activities that expand or build on your knowledge and skills with new product releases, GTM programs and initiatives & relevant enablement sessions, participate in departmental activities like GTM or SE offsites.
job_tasks.justification: Providing updates for forecasting and participating in development/enablement sessions relate to understanding business operations and strategic initiatives (Go-To-Market - GTM), as well as continuous learning within a business context.

soft_skills.phrase: Answer questions and provide technical guidance to the customer's technical team regarding the demonstrated or evaluated solutions
soft_skills.justification: Providing technical guidance to a customer's team is a direct form of communication and knowledge sharing.

soft_skills.phrase: working with marketing and or partners on campaign design and execution
soft_skills.justification: This explicitly mentions working with marketing and partners, which is a core aspect of collaboration.

soft_skills.phrase: participate in continuous development activities that expand or build on your knowledge and skills with new product releases, GTM programs and initiatives & relevant enablement sessions
soft_skills.justification: This phrase directly indicates a requirement for continuous learning and skill development related to product releases and programs.

soft_skills.phrase: lead the combined team to carry out the agreed upon course of action
soft_skills.justification: Leading a team to execute a plan demonstrates ownership and initiative.

profile.rationale: The job advertisement describes a Sales Engineer role focused on demonstrating a product (Dataiku), providing technical guidance to customers, and supporting sales/marketing activities. There are no tasks or technologies mentioned that relate to core software engineering (Macro-Category A) or AI/ML specialization (Macro-Category B). The role is primarily sales-focused with a technical pre-sales component, not a development or AI/ML engineering role.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is very clear about the nature of the role being a Sales Engineer, with responsibilities centered around product demonstrations, customer technical guidance, and sales support. There is no ambiguity regarding AI/ML tasks or core software development, making the classification straightforward.
